name: EVOC Seat Pack with Boa
description: A quick fix for your storage needs. This seat post bag is expandable with roll-top access. The Boa® attachment system is super secure, compatible with fixed or dropper seat posts.140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating is durable and weather-resistant.Roll-top design gives you adjustable volume and access from the back.Boa® Fit System allows secure attachment to seat posts, including droppers.
